name: S.O.D: State of Disorder
description: State of Disorder (S.O.D) is a 3D action platformer where we follow a rogue Battle Bot code name MK-84.  An abandoned industrial stronghold known as the District has been taken and is occupied by a mechanized army called the Stryker Division. MK's mission, destroy the Strykers and liberate the District. This will change the tide in the Zone War.
